document.full_text: in a valedictory monologue that was something between a graduation address and a sunday homily, oprah winfrey signed off from her 25-year show.
document.title: the tv watch: television diva gives thanks and signs off
lines_and_colors: in a valedictory monologue that was something between a graduation address and a sunday homily, oprah winfrey signed off from her 25-year show.
